content.value:
Spending the little time we got with him was a blessing and I don’t regret rescuing this little sick puppy even if I’m the saddest I’ve ever been today.

Keep your pets up to date on their vaccinations. 

Get puppies from responsible breeders. 

Kiss your pets today.
